verses.name: Mark 7:9
verses.text: And he said unto them, Full well ye reject the commandment of God, that ye may keep your own tradition.

verses.name: Mark 7:10
verses.text: For Moses said, Honour thy father and thy mother; and, Whoso curseth father or mother, let him die the death:

verses.name: Mark 7:11
verses.text: But ye say, If a man shall say to his father or mother, It is Corban, that is to say, a gift, by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me; he shall be free.

verses.name: Mark 7:12
verses.text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother;
